#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#define ll long long int

using namespace std;

//FAST IO

void fastscan(ll &x)
{
    bool neg=false;
    register int c;
    x=0;

    c=getchar();

    if(c=='-')
        neg=true;

    for(;(c>47 && c<58);c=getchar())
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-48;

    if(neg)
        x*=(-1);
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);

    cin.tie(NULL);

    int t;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        ll x;

        //fastscan(x);
        cin>>x;

        ll n=1;

        while(x!=1)
        {
            n=n<<1;
            x/=2;
        }
        cout<<n<<endl;
    }
    return(0);
}
